title: 155: The Cathars, or "Helios's Acolytes of Love"
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Let's talk about gnosticism. Let's talk about heresy. Let's talk about Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie's book, "Montaillou, Cathars and Catholics in a French village, 1294-1324." Let's talk about starting our own cult.
itunes:author: Betelgeuse, Vega, Fomalhaut
itunes:subtitle: Just you WAIT till the solstice, bro, you'll be glad you bought this timeshare
